/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/compilers/bin/nvc++ -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,my_module.so -o my_module.so CMakeFiles/my_module.dir/wrapper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_module.dir/kernel.cu.o   -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/cuda/12.6/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/math_libs/12.6/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/comm_libs/12.6/nccl/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/comm_libs/12.6/nvshmem/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/cuda/12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/cuda/12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/cuda/12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.11/cuda/12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
